titleStmt.title: Two sermons preached at the Cathedral Church of Norwich the one upon the 3d of May being Wednesday in Rogation week, the other upon the 29th day of May being the solemnization of His Majesties birth and restauration / by William Smith, D.D., Preb.
titleStmt.author: Smith, William, b. 1615 or 16.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.M. for Walter Kettilby,

notesStmt.note: "Published at the desire of the chief magistrates of the city of Norwich."
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
